name: ChatteringKitchen.Com
tag_list: food, travel, south-east-asia, cooking, recipes, restaurants, reviews, social-media-management
overview: A comprehensive food and travel website that provides information to people from all walks of life. Currently focused on travel tips and restaurant reviews of countries in South-East Asia, including Malaysia and Singapore. Furthermore, the website also provides in-depth recipes from around the world along with culinary tips. Also branching out into Social Media Management and Consulting.
